page.title: 12Children's Reading-Dymchurch
page.content: Reading education consists of: a silent reading session for 20 min- utes every school morning.The beginner readers are put on The Individualised Reading Scheme.The better readers have a choice of about 300 fiction books from their class library.We asked the fourth year children about their read- ing at home:13% do not read at home 24% read some days 11% read once a week 52% read every day 40% go to a local library.Last week this is what we read at home: Tintin 27%,Horror and Mystery 13%,News -papers 22%,T.V.Times & Radio Times 13%,Hobby books 15% and Asterix 10%. The 2 most popular authors are Roald Dahl and Betsy Byars.The school (7-11 yrs) voted "The BFG"by Roald Dahl as the best book they had ever read.
